TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BindingElementExtensionElement extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement

Docs.summary: Enables the use of a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> implementation from a machine or application configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You should derive from the BindingElementExtensionElement class to use a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> implementation from a machine or application configuration file.
Once a BindingElementExtensionElement instance has been created, a custom binding element is returned. You can use this in an application configuration file by using the <`add`> element and setting the type attribute to the BindingElementExtensionElement class, and the name attribute to the custom binding element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyConfiguration(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement bindingElement) cil managed

Docs.summary: Applies the content of a specified binding element to this binding configuration element.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref:System.Type> object that represents the custom binding element.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Type> object that represents the custom binding type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Override and implement the BindingElementType property to return the type of the custom binding element this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement> associates with the configuration system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement CreateBindingElement() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns a custom binding element object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeFrom(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement bindingElement) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes this binding configuration section with the content of the specified binding element.
